backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing leads and user profiles with admin-protected access and bootstrap-based admin initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend image‑update features with related components, files, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and color‑variable definitions with dark mode tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including SEO metadata, Inter font preload, dark mode class, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling client‑side routing, insight article rendering, and scroll restoration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: UI card that validates a Principal ID and calls actor.grantAdminPrivileges, showing success or error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminToken: Form card for submitting a bootstrap token to initialize the first admin, handling success and common error cases.
frontend/src/components/contact/CompanyP: Dialog that collects lead details, submits them, and triggers a company profile download on success.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactO: Grid of contact actions including strategy call booking, profile download dialog, and email link.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, attribution link, and current year.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: Lead-generation form collecting company and challenge details, validating input, and submitting via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/forms/FounderCon: Inquiry form for the Founder Control Blueprint, validating detailed business inputs and submitting via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: Lead-generation form collecting company, industry, revenue, bottleneck, and contact info with validation and submission via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/forms/InsightsNe: Newsletter signup form capturing name, email, company, and revenue range with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/ProcessLea: Process-focused lead form gathering company details and operational challenges, including retry logic for submission errors.
frontend/src/components/forms/StrategySe: Application form for strategy sessions collecting detailed company data, systems info, and bottlenecks before submitting via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/industries/CaseS: UI card for case studies that opens PDFs or triggers detail views depending on props.
Modal displaying case study sections with smart list detection and formatted content.
frontend/src/components/industries/indus: Defines TypeScript interfaces and static content for industries, major services, challenges, solutions, and case studies. Provides structured data used across the industries UI.
frontend/src/components/industries/Indus: Renders an industry section with challenges, solutions, major service tiles, and case study cards. Limits displayed services to those with matching solutions.
frontend/src/components/industries/Major: Displays a single major service with an image or fallback placeholder and its label. Handles image load errors gracefully.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopContr: Scroll‑to‑top button appearing after scroll threshold and scrolling smoothly to top.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Shows contact methods (email, phone, address) and a button to book a strategy call. Uses icons and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Displays the CONTROL framework steps with images in a scrollable or grid layout. Includes a handler to navigate to the full framework page.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Provides a dramatic messaging block highlighting founder dependency issues. Styled with dark themed backgrounds and centered text.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Presents a final call‑to‑action section encouraging users to book a strategy call. Includes headline, description, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Wraps the hero slider in a styled full‑screen background section. Adds gradient and pattern layers behind the slider.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSli: Implements an auto‑navigable, swipe‑supported hero slider with headlines and CTA actions. Manages slide state, transitions, and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Renders a grid of industry cards with icons, titles, and descriptions over a decorative background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays three featured insight articles with click navigation and a button linking to all insights.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Shows a list of business outcomes alongside a product mockup image.
frontend/src/components/sections/PageHer: Reusable hero section component with title, optional text, children, and a customizable background image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Lists common business problems with icon cards and ends with a systems-focused message.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Accordion-based walkthrough of four implementation steps, each with descriptions and bullet-point details.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Displays a grid of tech stack logos with labels in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Shows three feature cards describing control, clarity, and continuity with icons.
frontend/src/components/shared/StandardB: Provides bullet list components with checkmark icons for consistent styled lists.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with hash‑based section scrolling, route changes, mobile sheet menu, and scroll‑aware styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInitializatio: Checks whether the admin is initialized using the actor and returns status and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLeads.ts: Fetches all leads for admin users via React Query using the backend actor with identity-based cache keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin and handles authorization errors gracefully.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Performs backend health checks using the actor’s healthCheck method and exposes status and retry helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead data to the backend, manages loading and error states, and triggers health checks on failure.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference using a media query listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark‑mode styles, utilities, and reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/lib/contactConfig.ts: Defines external contact URLs and company contact details for use across the app.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Navigates to the strategy‑session page using client‑side routing and scrolls to top.
frontend/src/lib/techStackLogos.ts: Exports a list of tech‑stack logo metadata for homepage display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page managing authentication, admin status, leads, and bootstrap token actions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with hero, connection options, a scroll-targeted inquiry form, and qualification criteria. Includes hash-based scrolling logic and a detailed lead form section.
Displays the CONTROL framework overview with hero content, a scroll-to-form action, framework explanation, and multi-stage breakdown sections. Includes lead generation form anchor scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and an accordion-based FAQ list describing services, fit, process, and outcomes. Ends with a final call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Presents industry-specific content blocks with case study modal support and a strategy‑call CTA. Includes consistency traits and a lead‑gen section.
frontend/src/pages/insights/CanYourBusin: Renders the corresponding insight article using the shared layout and article metadata.
frontend/src/pages/insights/components/I: Provides the layout for insight articles, including SEO handling, back navigation, and structured content display.
frontend/src/pages/insights/components/u: Custom hook that updates document title and meta description for insight pages with cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/pages/insights/CrmVsErpWhat: Displays the CRM vs ERP insight article with a common article layout and dynamic section rendering.
frontend/src/pages/insights/ExcelIsNotAB: Shows the Excel business-system insight article using the shared layout and section mapper.
frontend/src/pages/insights/FromFounderD: Renders the founder-to-system-driven insight article through the shared article layout.
frontend/src/pages/insights/insightArtic: Defines all insight article metadata, including titles, slugs, descriptions, and structured section content.
frontend/src/pages/insights/insightSlugs: Exports stable slugs, titles, ordering, and helpers for validating and resolving insight article slugs.
frontend/src/pages/insights/TheHiddenCos: Displays the manual reporting cost article using the reusable insight layout and content structure.
frontend/src/pages/insights/WhyGrowthBre: Shows the growth vs weak infrastructure article with the unified layout and section mapping.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Renders the insights listing page with metadata updates, article grid navigation, and a newsletter signup form. Clicking an article updates history and scrolls to top.
frontend/src/pages/ProcessPage.tsx: Outlines the company’s transformation process with hero, philosophy, and detailed four‑stage breakdown sections. Includes bullet‑listed pain points and a strategy‑call CTA.
frontend/src/pages/StrategySessionPage.t: Page component showing a strategy session hero, eligibility sections, and a scroll-to-application-form action.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning, extended theme colors, typography, animations, and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and feature requests focused on replacing homepage CONTROL framework images with improved versions.
